name: The Enchanted Forest (Ula)
description: The story is that you get dropped into a cabin in the forest and you are brainwashed and do not remember anything. You then get told that you need to fight the beldams to survive. You go through levels of difficult obstacles. At the end you must use all your resources to fight the beldams and go to the next level that you don’t know exists until you go past the portal. In the next level of the game, you experience a world where the smurfs lived in for hundreds of years.
